data.text:
Ticket Reservation Form for "Vivia - A New Musical" Fort Gibson 2024 Spring Musical, Ticket Reservations

April 18, 20 & 21, 2024

Thank you for your interest in attending our 2024 Spring Musical, "Vivia, A New Musical," a show celebrating Fort Gibson's Bicentennial. "Vivia, A New Musical" is an original show written by Fort Gibson's own Beth Brannon and composed and arranged by Brad Henderson.

Use of this site will reserve the ticket(s), but is NOT a portal to pay for the ticket(s). Tickets are $5 for students (5 and Under are Free) and $10 for adults. Tickets will be purchased at the door.

If you submit an order to reserve seats for performance(s) using this site, your ticket(s) will be pulled and you will be able to pick up and pay for your tickets in the "Reserved Tickets" line located in the lobby of the Fort Gibson High School Auditorium. This option should save you time from standing in line of patrons purchasing tickets the day of the show who did not reserve their seats.

Please be aware that payment must be made using cash or check only. No credit cards will be accepted.

School building doors will be opened approximately 45 minutes prior to the start of the performance.

Auditorium doors will be opened approximately 30 minutes prior the the start of the performance.

Thursday, April 18, 7PM Curtain

Saturday, April 20, 2PM Curtain

Sunday, April 21, 2PM Curtain - RESERVATIONS HAVE ENDED, BUT YOU MAY PURCHASE A TICKET AT THE DOOR. TICKETS ARE STILL AVAILABLE.
